global_error_message.message: Sorry，an error occurred while loading hypertrons-crx extention...

component_error_message.message: Sorry, an error occurred while loading this component ...

component_developerCollabrationNetwork_d.message: Developer Collaboration Network shows the collaboration between developers for a given time period
Node: Developer, node size indicates developer activity
Edge: Collaborative relationship between developers, the thickness of the edge indicates the closeness of the connection between developers

component_projectCorrelationNetwork_desc.message: Project Correlation Network shows the Correlation between projects for a given time period
Node: Project, node size indicates project activity
Edge: Connection between projects, the thickness of the edge indicates the closeness of the connection between projects

component_mostParticipatedProjects_descr.message: Most Participated Repos shows the active projects of developers in a given time period
Node: Project, node size indicates project activity
Edge: Connection between projects, the thickness of the edge indicates the closeness of the connection between projects

component_activeDeveloperCollabrationNet.message: Active Developer Collabration Network shows the collaboration between active developers within the project for a given time period
Node: Developer, node size indicates the developer's contribution to the project's activity
Edge: Collaborative relationship between developers, the thickness of the edge indicates the closeness of the connection between developers

options_dialog_token_message.message: How to generate a github token?

teachingBubble_text_content.message: Click here to see statistics data
